items.sentence: You can't tell anyone what I just told you.
You need to learn to get along with people.
Tom wants to buy a tent and a sleeping bag.
Discounts are available if you buy in bulk.
This is the best guitar that money can buy.
We expect to sell a lot more of these soon.
Tom took a knife out of the kitchen drawer.
Tom told everyone that he didn't know Mary.
Tom was diagnosed with Asperger's syndrome.
Would you rather travel by bus or by train?
I wonder whether or not Tom is trustworthy.
I wonder whether or not Tom is sympathetic.
I wonder whether or not Tom is really sick.
I wouldn't ever forget something like that.
People sometimes ask interesting questions.
I've just made coffee. Would you like some?
Can someone please teach me how to do this?
Do Tom and Mary both still like doing that?
Do you think Tom would've done it this way?
I told Tom that Mary was telling the truth.
I suppose we should ask Tom what he thinks.
How much will we have to pay to stay there?
Tom decided to stay for another three days.
Even though Tom is wealthy, he's not happy.
Even though Tom is wealthy, he isn't happy.
I was surprised by Tom's sudden appearance.
I was taken to a circus for the first time.
I don't like the atmosphere of that school.
I've wanted this CD player for a long time.
I've been searching for my puppy for weeks.
I don't usually stop if the light's yellow.
That's not the sort of thing we like to do.
A lot of foreigners visit Japan every year.
Every year, I buy new notebooks for school.
I'm very pleased that your dream came true.
My dream is to take a round-the-world trip.
Have you ever wanted to live anywhere else?
Tom wore his bathing suit under his shorts.
The problem seems to have corrected itself.
That was the only way to solve the problem.
Soon, this will be somebody else's problem.
I'd like an opportunity to explain my plan.
I'd get to bed early tonight if I were you.
I'd appreciate your support in this matter.
I wonder when the meeting's going to start.
I wonder what we're going to do after this.
I wonder how permanent this is going to be.
I won't tell anybody what you just told me.
I won't keep you any longer than I need to.
I wasn't sure where I was supposed to wait.
